page.title: 07 AGRICULTURE
page.content: There are 3 agricultural merchants in Maud,Elbars, Sellars and Grampian tractors.Sellars started over 100 years ago as a family firm making horse ploughs,broadcasters & other horse implements.They are now owned by Dalgety a group of companies.Elbars was started by a group of farmers 30 years ago. Each firm employs a manager 3 sales staff & 5 mechanics in the workshop & for travelling to farms to do repairs. They are main agents for various makes of tractors, combines, grass machinery,ploughs,drills,balers harvesters, planters,sprayers,rollers & sell many other farming implements, potato machinery,harrows,seeders. The Chemical Spraying Company advise farmers what chemicals to use on their crops of wheat,barley,rape,potatoes or oats to kill weeds,pests and diseases.
